author: Lauren Roberts
title: 'If she got coronavirus, it'd be a death sentence': Son's plea for quarantine help
description: Mark lives with his 91-year-old mum, so chose to self-isolate in Adelaide before flying home to Darwin. But a quick change in the law means he's now facing four weeks' isolation and a $3,100 bill.
content:
Updated 
April 02, 2020 08:06:05
Long-term Territorian Mark Horrocks lives with his 91-year-old mum and has been anxious to keep her safe during the coronavirus pandemic.
